title: Nokia C01 Plus (Grey, 16 GB)  (2 GB RAM)

product_specification.In The Box: Handset, Battery, Charger, Micro USB Cable, Quick Start Guide
product_specification.Flash: Rear LED Flash | Front LED Flash
product_specification.Sensors: Ambient Light Sensor, Proximity Sensor, Accelerometer (G Sensor)
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Manufacturer Warranty For Device and Battery and 6 Months Manufacturer Warranty for In-box Accessories From the Date of Purchase

product_description.Clear HD+ Display: The HD+ screen of the Nokia C01 Plus mobile phone makes your video calling experience with your friends and loved ones an enjoyable one. The HD screen offers you attractive visuals with enhanced clarity. And, with the all-day-long battery capacity, you can effortlessly complete all your important tasks on time.
product_description.Remarkable Safety Features: This Nokia smartphone comes with a range of exciting features, such as a secured Android 11 (Go edition) and an AI-powered face unlocking sensor. As a result, you can have an increased storage space with Android 11 (Go edition) and get long-term safety on your phone.
product_description.Long-lasting Design: Be it everyday knockdowns, bumps or minor drops, this Nokia C01 Plus smartphone is designed to endure accidents and shocks. Moreover, it can even withstand twists, heat and humidity, thus ensuring long-lasting usage.
product_description.Stunning Camera: Capture your memorable moments with the HDR camera. Also, it comes with a flash on both sides of the mobile phone so that you can take high-quality pictures even during dimming light conditions.
product_description.Responsive Performance: Powered by an efficient Octa-core processor and 4G connection, this smartphone makes it a delight for you to stream movies, play games, and browse the internet. Thus, keeping you engaged on the phone throughout the day.

review:
Amazing phone. True Nokia!

Pros: Very durable (similar to old Nokia phones). Very clean & efficient software (stock android). Lag-free software (YES! 2GB RAM and LAG-FREE!). I use ROG Phone 3 alongside this phone and I'm still calling this phone a "lag-free" phone; so you can imagine how good my experience is. Decent speaker.

Cons: Camera is pathetic, even for a 5MP ! Really really really bad camera (rear & front). 1 star down because of this.

Really slow,stuttering and would start overheating right out of the box. You cant even return this. They told me they scheduled a technician visit but there was no visit. Its been 3 weeks.Bought it for my grandfather as he didn't want a large screen phone and nokia is a trusted brand.But this phone is really bad. Not at all a phone to be used in 2021.
Excellent phone at this price range.

Budget phone

Camera 📸 desent according to prize segment

Battery 🔋 is decert

1st of all don't except too much
I recommend this phone for online class , or secondary phone
In this price range all features is ok ok
Quality wise its a nokia🔥
But camera is very poor ( But u got front flash too)

It's a almost smartphone....almost😁👍
This device is not detecting any other sim. Only jio
From the first day it has Camera issue .

Bad phone. It detects only jio sim and flipkart not mentioned it anywhere. flipkart have no intentions to return the product. Fed-up with flipkart service. Mis leading customers to sell bad products without giving proper information.. please don't go for this product.

its a good mobile for normal user or beginners.
only problem in this mobile is battery.battery is average.its give hardly 5hour battery backup and its also need Atleast 1hour and 50 minutes for full charge

Decent Android phone according to price range, display and sound output quality is really appreciated from this handset but don't expect good picture clicks from front and back camera, battery backup is medium. Overall not bad 👍🏻
Jio sim is mandatory which is a downside for this phone. It would have been better if Jio was made not mandatory
Value of money this one is super thanks to flipkart

its features, poor display, removable batteries all taken me back to 7 years, while we are receiving good phones by 7.5k it is waste to spend 6k for this phone.
Phone is good at this price range.

This rating is not for the product but for the servie from Flipkart, the product is ok in that price range. But Flipkart should have specified on the product page that the Mobile works only with Jio SIM and not any other SIM. Had to port my number from other carrier to Jio because of that. Please note that this mobile works with Jio SIM only.
Very very very very very good product 👍
Best in this segment, value for money offcourse.
Awesome phone! Proper Nokia. Made in India 🇮🇳
Bad piece. Doesn't make a call. Calls come after 10 min automatically.
Value for money , affordable, trusted brand.

Ordered this for my grandmother...gets the job done done for her...i tried using it...i was annoyed by the touch response and the heptic motor felt so cheap..may be because i am using a better phone...but again, it is serving its purpose..so ,fine for me.

After using it for 3 months i think:-
1. The phone should be little bit fast.
2. The battery must stay at least for 12hr.
3. And the ph must have a wiredheadphone with it.
All together its not a value for money product but its not a worst product.
Over all phone is good but battery was not good...
It is good but needs to improve.
Best phone and best display very fast working..
Removable battery is good for mobile and all features are waste for this price

pl do not buy this product, it is wastage of money
